content: Hi all! Here is the thread of discussion for David's tutorial, "Introduction to Applied Category Theory".

Abstract:
I'll give a basic introduction to category theory and how it can be relevant to real life.

When and where: Sunday July 5, 13:00 UTC (9 am EDT)
Zoom meeting: https://mit.zoom.us/j/7055345747
See also the main website.

Hi, currently the ACT YouTube Live-stream playlist doesn't show any sessions for Sunday July 5, so it looks like we have to be on Zoom...
Do you know if tutorials will be live-streamed on Youtube and remain in the ACT youtube channel?
Thanks
Hi! The tutorials will only be on Zoom, since they are interactive. However there will be a later recording (if the speakers agree).

Hello all! Here's the video.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cJ46AOEOc14&list=PLCOXjXDLt3pYPE63bVbsVfA41_wa3sZOh
